io.spine.server.storage

Interface StorageFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryStorageFactory

    public interface StorageFactory
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A factory for creating storages used by repositories, EventStore, and Stand.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StorageFactory copyFor(io.spine.core.BoundedContextName name, boolean multitenant)
      Creates a new instance for serving a BoundedContext with the passed name and multi-tenancy status.
      <I> AggregateStorage<I> createAggregateStorage(java.lang.Class<? extends Aggregate<I,?,?>> aggregateClass)
      Creates a new AggregateStorage instance.
      <I> ProjectionStorage<I> createProjectionStorage(java.lang.Class<? extends Projection<I,?,?>> projectionClass)
      Creates a new ProjectionStorage instance.
      <I> RecordStorage<I> createRecordStorage(java.lang.Class<? extends Entity<I,?>> entityClass)
      Creates a new RecordStorage instance.
      ColumnTypeRegistry getTypeRegistry()
      Retrieves the type registry which declares how to store values of certain types in the storages generated by this factory.
      boolean isMultitenant()
      Verifies if the storage factory is configured to serve a multi-tenant application.
      StorageFactory toSingleTenant()
      Creates a single-tenant version of the factory.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • isMultitenant

        boolean isMultitenant()
        Verifies if the storage factory is configured to serve a multi-tenant application.
        Returns:
        true if the factory would produce multi-tenant storages, false otherwise

      • getTypeRegistry

        ColumnTypeRegistry getTypeRegistry()
        Retrieves the type registry which declares how to store values of certain types in the storages generated by this factory.
        Returns:
        immutable registry of type convection strategies

      • createAggregateStorage

        <I> AggregateStorage<I> createAggregateStorage(java.lang.Class<? extends Aggregate<I,?,?>> aggregateClass)
        Creates a new AggregateStorage instance.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of aggregate IDs
        Parameters:
        aggregateClass - the class of aggregates to store

      • createRecordStorage

        <I> RecordStorage<I> createRecordStorage(java.lang.Class<? extends Entity<I,?>> entityClass)
        Creates a new RecordStorage instance.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of entity IDs
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the class of entities to store

      • createProjectionStorage

        <I> ProjectionStorage<I> createProjectionStorage(java.lang.Class<? extends Projection<I,?,?>> projectionClass)
        Creates a new ProjectionStorage instance.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of stream projection IDs
        Parameters:
        projectionClass - the class of projections to be stored

      • toSingleTenant

        StorageFactory toSingleTenant()
        Creates a single-tenant version of the factory.

        This method is needed for creating single-tenant storages using a multi-tenant instance of a StorageFactory.

        Returns:
        a single-tenant version of the factory, or this if the factory is single-tenant

      • copyFor

        StorageFactory copyFor(io.spine.core.BoundedContextName name,
                       boolean multitenant)
        Creates a new instance for serving a BoundedContext with the passed name and multi-tenancy status.
